Report.Description: This report lists the currently configured File evidence exclussion rules.
Report.SearchSQL: SELECT cifer.[FileName] ,cifer.[FileVersion] ,cifer.[ProductVersion] ,cifer.[ProductName] ,cifer.[FilePath] ,cifer.[Company] ,cifer.[Description] ,cifer.[FileSize] FROM dbo.[CustomImportedFileEvidenceRule] cifer ORDER BY cifer.[FilePath], cifer.[FileName]
